Package angstd.ui.views.view.manager

Interface Summary
ComponentManager<T extends AngstdData,C extends ViewComponent> The ComponentManager interface is a manager which maps backend data to their UI ViewComponents.
FontManager<C extends ViewComponent> The FontManager is a ViewManager which handles the font attribute for ViewComponents.
SelectionManager<C extends ViewComponent> The SelectionManager is a ViewManager which handles the selection of ViewComponents.
ViewManager Views within Angstd display graphical components ViewComponent for backend data models.
 

Class Summary
AbstractComponentManager<T extends AngstdData,C extends ViewComponent> Basic implementation for the ComponentManager interface.
DefaultFontManager<C extends ViewComponent> Basic implementation of the FontManager interface.
DefaultSelectionManager<C extends ViewComponent> Basic implementation of the SelectionManager interface.
DefaultViewManager Basic implementation of the ViewManager interface managing the methods for communication with the observed view.
